about_the_game:
The main character of this story is a small slimy creature with fast mobility which is teleported to a world inhabited by magical and hostile beings, the little Slime must explore the place where he appeared and fulfill missions eliminating monsters to obtain skills and resources for their own survival.


An elementalist Slime
The Slime for some reason is surprisingly very skilled as it can use all the primordial elements of nature (earth, fire, water and wind). Depending on the element, the Slime will change its appearance and improve its combat stats, such as increasing its attack damage, defense, life regeneration, etc.


Explore the world
Exploring the world deserves to be rewarded so every place you visit you will find chests containing items and mostly gold coins, this way I want to encourage you to visit new areas in search of treasures.


Features
  • Main character with fast mobility.
  • Character mobility with the mouse.
  • Metroidvania of exploration, for each place you explore you will get rewards.
  • Dynamic combat, you will be able to dodge attacks, enter and exit a fight when you decide.
  • Find, fight and interact with magical beings.
